values:
Didn't think I'd ever use this piece of crap ever again.

....


Hi.
I heard "I Believe In A Thing Called Love" by The Darkness. Good stuff, baby. Haha. Saw the video, too.

Ok. So. In a period of...ok, I'm not gonna check, a few minutes I guess, I've gone from really not liking Abby to being willing to try again. Well. You take as you want. I was really dumb Thursday. It's like I lost my brain from when school ended to the beginning of the concert. No really. I was being a complete moron. Well, I thought I was. I couldn't remember or think of shit. Yeah, whatever, I already updated my greatestjournal, so maybe later I'll just copy that onto here.

Oregon is a nice place, isn't it? Yes, it is. You
should live there. So should I. As of now
it's not crowded, but you never know. So
ummmm, ok...Oregon....yeah.

What State Is Perfect For You?

YOU ARE MARRIED TO A WoODCHUCK!!!

most of the time, but you know how to be bad.
;)

your fuck.

Magazine editor, talk show host, something to teach
people to change the world.

Mrs. Denton caught Alexa and me on greatestjournal. She was pissed. Said next time we'd talk to Glover. I think part of why she was pissed may have been because Alexa's entry was just oodles of swearing. But hey, it's all good.

Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. They blocked coheedandcambria.com on the school computers. Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. Their reason? "games". Hahahahahahahaha. Morons.

Yaaaaaayyyyyy. Christmas at Drew and Jennifer's. Fun. And guess what. I get to see Sierra! Yay! Happy is the turtle within me! I should tell her to get a greatestjournal. Then it'd be cool. Drew told me he's got all the big gifts, and so I need to tell him what small stuff I want. He said he might give me my present early. Asked me if I'd mind. Hell no! Hmm. What could it be? Damn, I wish I knew. Hmm. What am I going to get people for Christmas? Hmm. Something to ponder.

Fun, my mom made me cookies.

Silence! We have a new recliner. As beat up and uncomfortable the old one was, I like it better. The new one is tiny and the foot rest doesn't raise at all; it's really low to the ground. I don't like it. The arms and the back are too short. I liked the old one. It was big and cool and denim and I could curl up in it very comfortably, or I could sit back and my head would rest against it. With the new one, my head goes a little above it. Gah. AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!! DIE!!!!!

I had a dream. I was at a concert, and I left my purse somewhere at the place where you first go in. When I got back to it, there was a note there saying I shouldn't leave my purse unattended. In one of my notepads there were some drawings. They were really good. Oh, and I remember one of the songs I heard at the show was "Your New Aesthetic" by Jimmy Eat World. It was a really cool dream. I had another dream. I was in a house, with other people in there. It was like a haunted house. Well, actually, it's hard to describe this dream, because I know what it was like, but I can't explain it. I had a dream the night before. I was in a town. It was kind of a.........like an old western Traverse Town. But kinda like Homer's hallucination when he ate the pepper at the Chili Cookoff. You know, with the coyote and the soulmate thing. Anyways, in part of it, I walk up to a door to a building. Some guy walks through it, and a guillotine blade comes down. Apparently the owners had put it in and didn't tell anyone about the change. So, every few seconds, it comes down. I walk away. Actually, the way the dream looked, it reminded me of the animation in Okage. A bit. In part of it, two of the guys i hang out with (I think one was Tim) battle. Kind of. Did you ever see Mad Max Thunderdome? How the people would watch two guys try to kill each other? Yeah. Except minus the Thunderdome. So, I was in the crowd, and each guy has a big thingy on wheels. Like a wheelbarrow, but really big and flat. One guy has a bunch of sacks of stuff on it. The other has a bunch of metal stuff. They shover the two thingies at each other. Basically, it's bloody gorey fight-to-the-death kinda thing. There was more to it than the moving thingies. Anyways, I can't watch, so I leave. I climb on top of this roof sorta thing. I wanted to go through one of the little windows (like the ones you can't go into in video games) but Jiffy was there and she was saying no, lets go this way. Then one of the guys comes, and he's painting the wall below us slime green. Then he starts painting it bright red. Ok, so this dream may not sound so bad. But it was really kinda freaky. I couldn't remember them very well, sorry. Oh well. Anyways....once again, my weekend plans were fucked up. I slept all of Saturday, making it very hard indeed for me to answer the phone, and my mom, whenever she heard the phone ring, was probably playing minesweep on the computer and wanted to just get those last ten before getting up to answer the phone. Oh well. I did stay up until 4:30am watching volume 1 disc 2 of Futurama. Five episodes of fun. Then I watched two with audio commentary, but I was tired and went to sleep after that. I also watched Thumb Wars. And then I watched it with audio commentary. Hahahahahahahahhahahahahaha. "Now touch your tongue to mine." "Why?" "To make it all official." Umm..to make what official?" "You know. All of it. Uh. Nevermind. Let's go." Boys suck. Ok. Boys don't suck all the time. And not all boys. The only guy I can think of that's never done anything to piss me off is Casey. Yay for you, Casey. The perfect gentleman, if there ever was one. Well, as far as I can tell. Mandi, I lloooovvvvveee you. Thanks for keeping me from totally losing control in Biology. Hahahahahahahahaha. I watched "Monty Python's The Meaning Of Life". Definitely a guy movie. But very funny. Best was the end with the Grim Reaper.

Fun. I'm at Alexa's house. We're about to go walking. Fun. I love stuff. SFJGSRDUJSDRHAZDGJXRHSADZFNHE! Fun. Yay, I put my AIM namey thingy on my lj, so, even though I don't even have internet at my house, you can now all know it. WOOOOOOOWWWWWWW. Ooh. We're gonna eat at Stonewall's. And then go pick up whores. Ok, we aren't really. Well, I'm pretty sure we aren't. You never know what the evening will hold. You people. Just because Alexa is unsocial and "look, I hate everyone and I'm scary" at school around the morons does not mean she hates everybody. And yes, I know you don't all hate her, if any of you "hate" her at all, which I sincerely hope you don't. But you just haven't hung out with her and seen how cool she is. Casey knows she's cool! Yay. The rest of you, don't be all "look at me, I'm all judgey and stuff!". Ok, maybe you guys aren't like that. Whatever.

Hello this is me, alexa, wwhheheeeee i dont hate everyone =P, i love you all!!!! hehe!!! whaa whoo whoever reads this, i really love you i just don't know how to tell you.
well, roughly. yeah, sleep just wasn't my buddy last night.

You are Daria from Daria. You are full of sadness
and everything bad. You love to read, and you
are very smart. However, you are cool to
others. Even though you are so smart and quiet,
you seem cool to others. You get mad at others
quickly, but you only show it in your face. You
are very anti-social, but you do have a couple
of friends one or two. You are pretty
depressed. You have very little happiness in
you. You are very different from others. You
make the school seem much better because you
are not the exact same as the other girls. You
are not very religious, however. Actually, you
are not religious at all. Most likely, you are
going to die of cancer - sorry for that. Good
luck desperate person!

*****WHAT CARTOON ARE YOU??? - NEW AND IMPROVED - MANY DIFFERENT RESULTS*****
brought to you by Quizilla I really have to see that cartoon...somehow...I've never seen it...
You are the stratus cloud. Many people dislike you
and you are very unfriendly. Just about all, I
would describe you as under-average. You could
improve yourself by not being so mean and stop
playing pranks on people. I bet you know that
people do not like you.

Which Cloud Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

sometimes my mom pisses me off sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo much. so does everybody else! some people have no fucking purpose! they contribute nothing! All they'll ever do in their life is have lots of equally useless kids and bad hair!
Is that what you call a getaway? Tell me what you got away with Cause I've seen more spine in jellyfish I've seen more guts in eleven-year-old kids Have another drink and drive yourself home I hope there's ice on all the roads And you can think of me when you forget your seatbelt and again when your head goes through the windshield

I wanna get everybody Christmas presents. But I don't know if I can. I know I'm gonna get a lot of shit at the Armadillo Christmas Bazaar (which I recommend to anyone who lives near Austin) and yeah. I really wish my mom would get the computer fixed, so we could get a cd burner, so I could burn cds; and if we had a working computer, we would get internet, and I could also use cd-roms and play Riven and Myst and Grim Fandango and You Don't Know Jack and yeah. Except I really suck at Riven, Myst, and Grim Fandango. But I wanna play 'em soooooo much. I would have gone to Jeremy's house on Saturday...but I didn't. No way to get there, I guess. And I never went to Alexa's house. Wow. Weekend plans just didn't pan out. I spent Saturday sleeping, sitting on a rock at the river watching/hating people and listening to Spiritual Machines, sitting in my room, and so on. Today I was ok. Woke up and watched tv. Saturday tv (for someone who doesn't get cool channels) really sucks. Sunday tv is gooder, because there's Seinfeld and stuff like that on Fox. Yay. I saw an episode of Seinfeld today that I'd never seen before, which was really cool because I've watched reruns of it all the time since it ended, and I of course watched it when it was still going. Yay. And stuff...yeah. Ffffuuuuuuuucccccckkkkkkkkkkkkkkk yyyyyyyyyyoooooooooooouuuuuuuuuuuuuuu

Soooo...my Thanksgiving was better than I thought it'd be. I spent the day at Sally's(friend of family) hanging out with Eliza. She lives in Austin, and is two years younger than me. And she doesn't like gore. But that's ok. We had fun with Eskimo Bill and Walter. Of course, we had to be careful not to lose Eskimo Bill's wheel. And yeah, and stuff, and she was really cool to hang out with. I didn't eat much; Thanksgiving food is not really the stuff for me. I had part of a roll, some mashed potatoes, and half of a tiny piece of pecan pie that had a lot of bourbon in it that hadn't been cooked out completely or whatever(I got a headache on the way home).

By the way, I've fiinnaaallllly fixed Eskimo Bill's loose wheel. Krazy glue is fun. Now he goes like the wind... Or just a little toy car without a broken wheel. I also found my string, so I now have a new little bracelet thingy, which I attached to my trapper, and I'm in the process of making a new one. What fun.

My pants don't fit me any more. I really need to get new one, since my current pants are too small. (Ha, this makes me happy. Except I can't wear them, because they're constantly about to fall off. Or could easily be pulled off(Don't even think about it).)

I was surprised by people's reactions to my "high school is a puzzle" thing. Usually my ideas come out sounding like shit.
You know that one survey where it said "Name one thing you would change about yourself", and I listed a bunch? Just one: my ADD. It ruins me.

Chris did really well at the Talent Show. I know I laughed. Hehe. Trucks. Mandi and Cori were awesome. Yay for all of you that were incredibly brave to go up there!

Acgh! It's really hot in here!
And yet my fingers are cold.
Oh my god! My mom made cookies, and they are sooo good! *drool*

Woo! I figured out the dungeon I was stuck on in Okage! But then I discovered I wasn't at a high enough level to beat the boss, so I have to level up in that little dungeon in Madril. Bummer. And I beat Kurt Zisa in Kingdom Hearts! But I'm still stuck on all the other hidden bosses. Stupid bosses... I should start playing Ratchet and Clank again. That game is pretty damn nifty. 

Lj wasn't working the first time I tried to post this, so I posted it on my greatestjournal and restarted. It sucked.

a) Who was I talking to about who Aquaman could never beat?

b) Why can't I remember who I determined later could never be beaten by Aquaman?

Hmmm........Mr. Freeze! How could Aquaman defeat Mr. Freeze, I ask you?

You ever think that maybe...high school is like one big puzzle without edges, and every student has their own puzzle piece? And we're all just trying to figure out where our piece goes, and sometimes...meh, this made a lot more sense and was a lot easier to set out when I was walking home the other day. I'll figure it out later and go back and edit this and then maybe it'll make sense.

Ugh. The flu. I did say "I wish I'd get the flu," I know, but it sucks a lot more than I thought it would. Blah. But hey, I did get to spend two and a half days miserable at home, as opposed to miserable in a different way at school. My head hurt, my sinuses hurt, my throat hurt, my stomach hurt (but that's because I was hungry), all that good shit. Oh, and I was either freezing cold or boiling hot. Yeah. I feel a lot better. Except I still have a heinous cough and I'm still all congested or whatever the shit. Sleeping was hell. It was like I was half asleep, and a few minutes or hours later, I'd wake up, then go back to sleep, but it was restless not-so-happy half sleep and crap. Um, soooo... Hopefully you guys fared better last week..

I like the color my hair is now. Dark brown, but with a pretty glintiness in the light.

I hope my mom doesn't make me go to school tomorrow. Although I do want to get back because I miss my friends. Not to mention that I'm so fucking behind in Art. I didn't even finish my last two projects, and I'm not even halfway through with one of the current ones, while everyone else is either finished or practically finished, and already well started on the next one.

I don't think things are going so great between me and Chris. He never talks to me. Unless I talk to him first. And then it's a very "Hi, how's your day going" conversation. I don't know, I'm terrible with this kind of thing. Boys suck.

I feel stupid now. Damn my natural inclination to feel stupid. All the fucking time.

JANUARY:
<strike>Stubborn and hard-hearted. Ambitious and serious. Loves to teach and be taught.</strike> Always looking at people's flaws and weaknesses. <strike>Likes to criticize. Hardworking and productive. Smart, neat and organized.</strike> Sensitive and has deep thoughts. <strike>Knows how to make others happy. Quiet unless excited or tensed.</strike> Rather reserved. <strike>Highly attentive.</strike> Resistant to illnesses but prone to colds. Romantic but has difficulties expressing love. Loves children. Loyal. <strike>Has great social abilities yet easily jealous.</strike> Very Stubborn and money cautious.
Golly gee, Mr. Lightbulb. Are you sure we won't get caught? This is serious stuff, and if someone catches us, we'll be in trouble for sure!

Intergalactic Murder by Alexa Suarez and Taylor Patterson
Ed Tyler: alien scientist guy Wilhelm Samantha Tyler: robot Clauss Santa: human intern at Zoronine Industries Rebecca: female alien employee at Zoronine Industries Muffy: talking killer dog Ina: female interstellar midget pirate 2568 AD [a guy is working on something] Ed Tyler: And now...the final bolt! [electical zappy noises] Finally, wilhelm Samatha Tyler is born! Wilhelm: Father? ET: I must go prepare for your birthday party! [rushes off] W: What's happening? Where am I? [stands and looks around] Hmm. ET: [rushes in with party stuff] Oh, you're up! Now...go to sleep so I can decorate! W: [goes to sleep] ET:[decorates and hums] ..........ok, you can wake up now. W: [continues to sleep] ET: [hits Wilhelm] Wake up! W: [wakes up] Gah! ET: Happy birthday, Wilhelm! W: Yay! [runs around making funny noises] Fwoo! Shwa! Hoohoo! [they party] 10 YEARS LATER [Wilhelm walking through Zoronine Industries Lab. Suddenly, some bolts fall out.] W: Curses! [searches] Clauss: [walks over] Need some help? W: Yes. Yes I do. C: What are you looking for? W: Some of my bolts. They fell out, and I need them. C: Why? W: Umm...I just do. [Clauss and Wilhelm search on the ground] C: Ah! I found one! [hands it to Wilhelm] How many fell out? W: 5. [they continue to search] C: I found two more! W: I found two! [they put the bolts back] W: What is your name, human? C: Clauss. Clauss Santa. [they have a shaking of hands] W: I am Robot 235068. Also known as Wilhelm Samantha Tyler. But you can call me Wilhelm. C: Cool! AND FROM THAT DAY FORWARD, THEY WERE GOOD FRIENDS. [in a field of flowers] [Clauss and Wilhelm are skipping through the field of flowers, humming] [distant rawr. Muffy is seen towards the back. Wilhelm and Clauss don't notice] [back at Zoronine Industries Lab, we see Rebecca walking. Muffy enters] Rebecca: [yells] Oh my, what a terribly hideous dog that is! Muffy: [gets angry] Foolish female! [attacks and kills Rebecca] That'll teach you to insult me! [Muffy exits] [ET enters and seees Rebecca's body] ET: Oh, that must have been painful! Who did this horrific crime?! [ET drags body off] [Clauss and Wilhelm in Zoronine Industries Lab] W: And this is where I was created! Exciting, huh? C: Yeah, it is! ET: [enters and sees Clauss] Why Wilhelm, who is this? W: Father, this is my friend, Clauss. He's a human. ET: I can see that. C: Umm...hi. Nice to meet you, sir. W: He helped me find my bolts that fell out. ET: [to Clauss] Could you excuse us for a moment, um, Clauss? C: Certainly. [exits] ET: [to Wilhelm] You know how I feel about humans. W: But Father, he helped me. He's nice. I thought maybe you'd- ET: [interrupts] That I'd what? W: That maybe...you'd think he's not so bad. ET: You know my position on this. W: But Father- ET: Say goodbye to your friend. I don't want to see you two together again. W: [exits] [to Wilhelm and Clauss] C: What was that about? W: My father says you have to leave. C: I wanna talk to him. W: I don't think that's a very smart thing to do. C: Nothing will happen. I just want to talk to him. [Clauss exits; changes to Clauss and ET] ET: Why are you still here? C: I just want a man-to-man talk. ET: Mhmmm man-to-man..huh? C: Yep. ET: Well what would you like to discuss in this man-to-man talk? C: Why can't I stay here? ET: You are a human..humans, they are filthy and slightly weird looking. C: Us humans are not filthy.. We have manners unlike your kind. ET: Rriigghhtt..whatever you say. [eats Clauss] Oops. [leaves] [in a field of flowers, ET is taking Muffy for a walk] M: [moves to use a bed of purple flowers as a restroom] ET: No! M: [growl] Why not? ET: Those will become beautiful one day. M: Umm..no. ET: Yes.. Wht's wrong with flowers? M: [barks; bites off ET's hand] Hmm flowers..they're ugly. ET: Muffy that was my hand! Well, I'll grow one again sometime. M: True.. I should have bitten your face off..maybe then you'd grow a prettier face. ET: Well you know you're not that cute either..you drool on yourself all day. M: [growls] [leaves the meadow] [back at Zoronine Industries Lab] ET: [enters] W: [notices ET} Where is Clauss? ET: He fell in a deep hole when I was walking him home. W: What do you mean? Why didn't you help him? ET: He fell and umm drowned in mud. W: What did you do to him?! ET: Nothing he fell. Dur. W: You're lying! What happened?! ET: [points to stomach] Yummy!? W: You ate him?! How could you?! ET: Did he even serve a purpose? W: He was my friend! [electric zappiness] I won't let you get away with killing my only friend! ET: MWUAHAHAHA...friend you had no [dies] [ET's words are cut short as Wilhelm kills him] BECAUSE OF HIS FATHER'S HORRIBLE CRIME, WILHELM IS DRIVEN INSANE. [in Zoronine Industries Lab] Ina: [enters, being chased by Muffy] Aaaah!* M: [jumps and attacks her] Ha! W: [turns and attacks Ina] Must destroy! I: Oh please no! [Muffy and Wilhelm kill Ina] M: Hello um I've seen you before; aren't you the professor's creation? W: Yes. He is dead now. Did you suffer at his hand too? M: I got his hand in my tummy. HAHA you're my buddy now. I've never had a buddy due to my drooling. W: We...are friends? M: My new buddy. Wanna go get some Burger King? W: Yes. Yes I do. SO, WILHELM AND MUFFY WENT ON TO BE GOOD FRIENDS. WILHELM REMAINED INSANE, AND MUFFY STAYED JUST THE WAY HE ALWAYS WAS.
THE END
*Ina was in the Zoronine Industries Lab because she was stealing stuff from it. Wilhelm killed her because he was psychotic or whatnot. Muffy killed her because he was a talking killer dog. Makes sense, no? Yeah, towards the end we just wrote the conversation between our characters like, I'd write Wilhelm's line, and Alexa would write her character's response, and so it was like a real conversation or whatnot. This is pretty much completely unchanged, except for a bit of proofreading. Excellent, if I do say so myself. :)

Jeremy, children dont like to be entertained that way. They dont think that it's all that "entertaining". Annie and I just thought we'd give you a heads up, since child entertainers always end up homeless, psycotic, "gunny" bums. SO DONT DOOOO IT! We looooooove you! Do NOT succumb to the giant snail suit!! BE YOU WARNED!

Hello Hello. well im sitting here with Taylor, YAY, and im listening to Killswitch Engage, do u like Killswitch Engage? i do, they're soo friggin great! yes! and im sitting here making funny noises. bye bye
<marquee>Yay I'm at Alexa's and she got me a picture and woohoo!</marquee>

me: i love this song
tim: what is it?
me: the light and the glass
tim: ok, what band?
me: Coheed and Cambria, moron!


...fuck you...

fucking sold out.

stupid motherfuckers who were smart enough to buy their tickets ahead of time, smart enough so that they didn't have to spend the rest of the night part bored and miserable as hell because they have so little to say to the people with them and part indifferent, and then go home and cry for a bit and then watch snl and then read until 5 am because reading and sleeping are the only ways to keep from thinking.

it didn't mean as much to any of you as it meant to me. yes, tim, i realize that it was your birthday and it must have really sucked to not be able to see Coheed and Cambria. but when i get depressed, music is the only fucking thing i care about. the best part of the entire night for me was getting "Wiretap Scars" by Sparta and the 30 Seconds to Mars cd. of course, those are two very excellent cds, and i'm glad i got them. oh yes, and the glow in the dark star from will. ooh. it glows. oh, and getting the black and glow-in-the-dark purple bracelets from hot topic. the guy at hot topic was really cool. i wish i'd been in more of a mood to be friendly. ok, so yeah, at the time i wasn't all that upset, but like i said to whitney, "i'm going to be really depressed about this later." and damn, was it true. i think i should've spent the day at the mall with alexa. if only i had known...

see? more overdramatickiness.

ignore that last post. As far as I can remember, I was just being really overdramatic and depressed because I was quite certain I was going to fail again. It was really late, and I hadn't even started. But then I stayed up until 5:00am working, and then the next day I spent a few hours in the band hall after school working on the stuff, turning it all in late, but at least turning it in. I just felt really shitty about myself and my procrastination and laziness. Ordinary self-hatred, disappointment, unnecessary drama crap from me. Yeah, sorry about that. Me overreacting. "I'm just..being stupid." Dear lord, how many times in the past few months have I said that? Way too many times. I need to stop being stupid.

Edit: Oh yeah, and I don't know why I made such a big deal about being grounded. Both days I as grounded I was at my mom's work anyways. And I had Friday free to do what I pleased. More overreacting. One of the things I hate most about myself. In the moment, everything seems so extreme, and later I realize it just isn't, and I feel really stupid about how stupid I was.
i just got a greatestjournal. what is it? basically, it's a livejournal. but with a different name. and you dont need a code. go get one. now. or not. i dont know why i got one, but hey, why not.

FUCKING SHIT! damn it! all of you! fucking shit. not you, nevermind. me. dammit. i fucking hate myself. dammitdammitdammit. how the fuck can i be this fucking stupid?! dammit! why can't i just be...i dont know, struck by lightning, pushed off the llano bridge, shot. no, i'm not suicidal. i just wish i were. not really. that sounds really fucking overdramatic. dammit! why the fuck! fuckingdammitshit!



<marquee>i wish i weren't grounded....</marquee>

I love sparknotes. It is awesome.
You are Lime. You are quirky and misunderstood. You are
definitely your own person. You don't let
anyone tell you who you should be. You never
sell out your values and beliefs, no matter
what. However, you can sometimes have trouble
fitting in, but only because you are
misunderstood. Most Compatible With: Wintergreen

Which Tic-Tac Flavor Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla Malt balls are icky. I really want a code. I hate this name. I already know what my name would be if I got a new lj. Which is kinda sad. Not in a "aw, she's upset" kinda sad, in a "that's pathetic" kinda sad.

goddess of hope. You are always looking on the
bright side of things.You help comfort and are
always there for someone in need.

How Would You Have Been Executed Back in the Day?
brought to you by Quizilla i heart you like a chicken hearts cheese.

Ok... Who wants to write an essay on Vikings for me? Anyone? Anyone? Ok, who wants to tell me what the hell a graphic organizer is and how I make one? Who wants to tell me how the hell you figure out what the theme of The Martian Chronicles is? Dammit, I'm so fucked. And my mom keeps coming in and yelling at me for being on the Co & Ca board and lj.

Yeah. I was sick today. So I slept for a few hours, and then read the rest of The Martian Chronicles for three hours, seeing as how I had a report on it due today. Yeah. Then I spent a while figuring out what the theme of it is, and how I can summarize it, and so on and so forth. Dammit. This is hard. Two posters, an essay, a graphic organizer (whatever the hell that is, I was absent the day she explained it), an oral report, and then the biology and geometry homework. Well, I'm fucked. And grounded for the rest of this week, not including weekend (fortunately). Is there a football game Friday? Anyways, The Martian Chronicles is pretty interesting. Of course, I was extremely pressed for time, and I had just taken my Concerta. Yay for me. I guess. The light show didn't suck nearly as much as I thought it would. Go band. And Annie gave me her glow stick. Hehe, thanks. Man, some of those 8th graders dress like whores. It's a shame. I never liked the kids a year younger than me. Weston is ok, and some others that I can't think of at the moment are ok, but the majority I don't like. Woohoo, I'm typing without looking at the keyboard. But since I only use one hand, it's going really slowly, so I'm gonna look. I want a new lj. Why? Because I hate my lj name. Maybe it's a dumb reason to you, but I feel really stupid whenever I tell someone my username. I had a sandwich today. And some pixy stix. Yep. That's about it. Yay for healthy eating, huh?

So, on Halloween, I went over to Alexa's house, and we messed around on the internet for a while. Then we walked over to Chris's house to get Chris, and then the tree of us walked around Llano, actually getting very little candy, and mostly just hanging out. That was lots of fun. Then Chris went home, and me and Alexa walked to the square. Alexa barked at people. She does the coolest bark. It sounds a hell of a lot like a real dog; like Ginger, actually. We walked across the bridge to the playsets in that park by the bridge and talked. Then we walked back across the bridge and sat on the base of that statue across from Stonewall on the square (where we had sat before) and just hung out. Patrick and Joey were walking back and forth in front of all the shops, and so Alexa and I walked over to them and I asked Patrick why they were walking back and forth. He said they were deciding what to do, since he has a job at the theater, and since they had taken all the toilet paper from the men's bathrooms at the school for toilet papering. He told me I should help them by getting all the toilet paper from the girls' bathrooms next year, and I said he needs only to remind me. So they walked off, and we walked back to Alexa's house, and then her dad gave me a ride home. Maybe it doesn't sound all that exciting, but it was probably the best Halloween I've ever had. Candy count: 2 tiny boxes of Nerds, a little box of Milkduds, a thing of Bottlecaps (which taste like little kid medicine), and a 3 Musketeers. And yeah, I think that's it. On Saturday, I went to Chris's house and we just lay on his bed watching Comedy Central. Then he asked me if I'd go out with him. Then, with very little hesitation, I said yes. So, yay, I have a boyfriend. Yeah, I don't sound, or, erm, read very enthusiastic or happy, but I really am. Chris is cool. So, anyways, a little later Jeremy came over, and we watched the beginning of The Godfather, decided it wasn't very attention-holding, and watched Waterworld instead. Then my mom called, and then came and got me. Exciting, no? Oh yeah, and those little round chocolates were really weird. I think I did get the only good one. So, today I went to Chris's house, and we lay on his bed and watched Comedy Central, and then we went to Mandi's house and hung out with her. Oh, the funness of it all. Best weekend since...last weekend, I guess. But it was great because otherwise, I would have been sitting around the house depressed. Tim, I was going to apologize to you. I don't know why you're so defensive about this. No matter what you wish on me, I don't wish any badness on you. I just don't want you to go out of your way to piss me off. You know what, I am sorry for some of what I said. Yeah, I've been a bitch. But whatever. You weren't completely undeserving. But whatever, if this is what you believe you wish to be the end of our friendship, there's not a lot I can do. Have a good life, meet your soulmate, have all the kids you want, work in something you love to do, be surrounded by people you love that love you, hire as many guys as you want to rape and kill me. If you're ending this, then whatever happens to you, have fun (except for the sending guys to rape and kill me; I hope you don't do that). Gah, I need to be doing my Biology. I will. Oh yes. You'll see. Ha. Man, I need to redye my hair pretty soon. It'll be fun... "Whose Line Is It Anyway" is so frickin awesome.

Tim, stop acting like the mistreated innocent here. You're so fucking ridiculous! Just stop. You act like you're so wounded. And then the best you can do is be a petty, patronizing little shitface. Fuck off. I can't stand to read your crap anymore.

Woohoo! It's Halloween! Party! Or just walk around looking cool. Whatever, it's all good.

I'm so very tired. Stupidhead Glover. Damn, I hate that man! Everyone in the school! You people who made your ljs protected because of the school..*shakes head* I don't give a fuck about the school reading my lj. What I've made protected is protected because it's only directed to my friends. I don't think I've posted anything that deserves counseling or even serious consideration. But hey, what the fuck, I don't even know fully what's going on.

I'm so very tired. Wait. Dammit. I already said that. Well, I did fall asleep at 3:00am. Oh yes, yes I did. But i keep forgetting what I was doing. Drawing on a pizza box, that's it. Moving my cork board or whatever the hell you call those things to next to my bed, so I can more easily see it and pin stuff to it. Like drawings that my friends do. And my Warped Tour ticket. Woohoo. That was a really awesome day. The day I went to Warped Tour. Oh fuck, I hope I can go to the Thrice, Thursday, and Coheed and Cambria show. I'd die if I knew that I almost got to go, but then couldn't. It's fucking Coheed and Cambria! I love them!

Your soul is bound to the Solitary Rose: The
Alone. "When I wake up alone, the shades are still
drawn on the cold window pane so they cast
their lines on my bed and lines on my
face." The Solitary Rose is associated with loneliness,
melancholy, and patience. It is governed by
the goddess Merope and its sign is The Sword,
or Unrequited Love. As a Solitary Rose, you may be summed up as a
hopeless romantic. You desire love and have so
much love to give, but thing just never seem to
work out the way you want them to. In life,
you can be very optimistic, even when things
are gray and nothing works out to your
expectations.

What Rose Is Your Soul Bound To?

Ohhhh. My weekend has reaallly sucked, for the most part. Coolness: today I went to Wal-Mart, the temple of Wal Mart, and guess who was there? Jeremy and Chris. Wow. How exciting is that? AND I found black nail polish (that wasn't special for Halloween and wasn't a crappy brand) again! Heh. So, yeah, I also got the pictures developed. The one of Mandi and Cori is great. And yes, JR did manage to get into plenty of them. And there are actually some tolerable pictures of me in there. After the temple of the god of Wal-Mart, Wal Mart, my mom and I went to H-E-B (Ham Eating Balloons), and I got some Wooden Fun Stix! Yeah, popsicle sticks. But the package said Wooden Fun Stix, so...whatcha gonna do? Not much. Actually, Ham Eating Balloons is where I got the black nail polish. Whatever. Hmm... Oh yes, and I got strawberry-watermelon push pop. Heehee.

So, yeah. I was really depressed yesterday. Gah, I fell asleep at 2 am and woke up at 7 am today. Shit.

The most I've eaten all weekend is a burrito and a half. Half a burrito, that is. But then I couldn't eat any more. The only other food I ate this weekend...umm, some fritos. Five pixy stix. Maybe a snickers. Nutritious. I did have coffee this morning. Ha. Yay for me.

Ooooh, I listened to the cd "Clarity", Jimmy Eat World. I'd never really gotten into it before. But I listened to it. And I realized....that cd kicks so much ass! Oh yes! So, I guess basically what I've been doing recently is listening to the cds I either never really liked at first, or the cds I got tired of a while ago. Really not a bad idea. I haven't listened to The Strokes in ages. But I just did. Now it's "Clarity" again. Next... maybe "Yourself or Someone Like You", Matchbox 20. Haven't listened to it in ages, baby.

Yeah. I love you guys. All of you, my friends. You are gorgeous in every way, no matter what anyone says. Maybe I might say otherwise sometimes, but right now...you are everything. Every day, you are everything.

So, apparently the band made 25. Yay for you guys. I wish I could've been there.

I had a dream. I was in a band. Alexa was there. After our performance, I changed into a white tank top and a long white skirt with a long black skirt over it, so you could see about six inches of white under the black. I don't really remember anything else. Maybe in this one, or maybe in another dream, Casey, you were there. I walked up to you and talked to you. It was a cool dream.

After I walked home from hanging with the band, I fell asleep at 6. And slept for eighteen hours. Woke up at 10, played Super Smash Brothers, took a bath, battled with my mom, went into my room and cried, wrote in my journal, cried. Oh, and Nikki called to tell me that they got the 25. What excitement.

I have no energy.

You know what I think? I think we should start a religion where Raine Maida is god. What did Christianity's god do for me? Well, I don't really know if he did anything or not. But Raine Maida creates incredible music that moves me more than any hymn or preacher ever could.

I have robot shirt now.

Biology was fun today. I wore Mandi's cool jacket. And I spent the entire time drawing on a little piece of paper with Chris. I drew monkeyface and handed it to him. He gave it a body. I gave it wings. And so forth. At some point I drew a flying pimp tree. Good times, man. Good stuff.

Maybe I've got some Viking in me. I am half Danish, after all.

Mandi, don't let the assholes of the world get you down. You are a fantastic person, one of the best I've ever met. You are so special (no, not like Kenny down the street who got hit in the head with a brick), and so many people love you. Remember that. Take some sparkle. A gift from me to you.
